name: Stuck Sprint 1
description:
WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Mouse - Camera

Scroll  / number:1-5 - Hotbar 

E - Inventory

F - Pickup item

Left Click - Item primary

Enemy

There's only one enemy who will dash to you if you get close, currently no animation to indicate that. Enemy does 13 damage on hit.

Items

Apple - Heal 10 health

Wooden Sword - 1 damage (30% chance for critical hit (2x damage))

Bow - Does nothing

Rock - can throw it (basically does nothing)

Steel Sword - 4 damage (50% chance for critical hit (2x damage))

There is no quit button so just "alt + f4" when you're done
